FileDescription: This file contains irrigation layout speicification and rules

IRAUTODEFMETHOD.Description: Tag for method of demand calculation - either SWDRIVEN or ETDRIVEN

IRTYPE.Description: Type of irrigation. Recorded, but does not influence code.

IRON.Description: Logial for whether irrigation is allowed during each major growth stage

IRMANDEPTH.Description: Soil depth considered for irrigaiton management decisions, for each major growth stage

IRWATEREC.Description: Salinity of irrigation water at each major growth stage

IRCRITSW.Description: Critical percentage of extractable soil water to trigger an irrigation, for each major growth stage

IRREFILLPER.Description: The percentage of deficit to refill, for each major growth stage

IRRETNPERIOD.Description: Days before next irrigation can occur, for each major growth stage

IRSTAGECAP.Description: Maximum irrigation total, for each major growth stage

IRDAYSTAGECAP.Description: Maximum daily irrigation, for each major growth stage

IRCUMNETET.Description: Cumulative net ET before next irrigation is triggered, for each major growth stage

IRETIRRAMT.Description: Percent of Cumulative net ET to apply after each ET trigger is reached, for each major growth stage
